author: psmith
msg: ZeroConfPlugin now getting some basic model details, and can save/restore it's preferences
When a device that has been registered as an auto-connect candidate appears
then a thread is started to auto-connect it.
Double-clicking the GUI item in the plugin connects/disconnects the Receiver,
this also prevents multiple receivers from being created for the same device.
Removed the property "ZeroConfDeviceName" because an Appender already has a Name property.

author: colm
msg: All of the changes are now rolled into one patch.

author: angela
msg: simple-server needs workspace name (see changes rev. 331281) -> adjusting index.jsp

author: thorsten
msg: cleaned up the code from not needed fragments. Added more comments to the classes, enhanced error message throwing and overall readablity of the code. Enhanced matching the state of the transformer, whether it is inside or outside of the structurer. With this it is now possible to have the structurer within other xml like <root><structurer/></root>. Moved helper classes to the dispatcherHelper.

author: joerg
msg: Fixed yet another issue with caching of i18n bundles when using multiple locations.
